entries.source: Chat Edit: 'quero que você crie uma conexão com o firebase para autenticação e já deixar com o contexto de autenticação'

Chat Edit: '[2025-09-24T22:54:37.808Z]  @firebase/firestore: "Firestore (12.3.0): Could not reach Cloud Firestore backend. Connection failed 1 times. Most recent error: FirebaseError: [code=unknown]: Fetching auth token failed: Firebase: Error (auth/network-request-failed).\nThis typically indicates that your device does not have a healthy Internet connection at the moment. The client will operate in offline mode until it is able to successfully connect to the backend."'
Chat Edit: 'olha, você já está alucinando bastante, veja o arquivos relativos ao firebase, já o faça funcinoar'
